class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(nums)
        arr = [0] * (k + 2)
        for i in range(n//2):
            lo, hi = nums[i], nums[n-i-1]
            if lo > hi:
                lo, hi = hi, lo
            c1 = max(k - lo, hi)
            arr[0] += 1
            arr[c1 + 1] -= 1
            if c1 < k:
                arr[c1 + 1] += 2
                # arr[k + 1] -= 2
            d = hi - lo
            arr[d] -= 1
            arr[d+1] += 1
        # print(list(accumulate(arr)))
        ans = inf
        acc = 0
        for a in arr[:k+1]:
            acc += a
            if acc < ans:
                ans = acc
        return ans
